meanings.definition: A method of cooking in Indian cuisine where spices are fried in oil to release their flavors.
meanings.sent1: I learned how to make a delicious bhuna by frying spices in oil.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a flavorful bhuna that was a hit with customers.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to make a bhuna but accidentally burned the spices!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the bhuna filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The secret to a perfect bhuna is to fry the spices just right.

meanings.definition: A dish prepared using the bhuna cooking method.
meanings.sent1: The chef's specialty was a mouth-watering bhuna made with care.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone raved about the delicious bhuna served.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the bhuna on my shirt, creating a spicy mess.
meanings.sent4: The bhuna on the menu was a star, outshining all other dishes.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bhuna wafted through the room, tempting everyone to try it.

meanings.definition: To cook using the bhuna method.
meanings.sent1: I decided to bhuna the spices before adding them to the dish.
meanings.sent2: She loves to bhuna the ingredients to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent3: While trying to bhuna the spices, I accidentally sneezed and added extra pepper!
meanings.sent4: The chef carefully bhunaed the spices, creating a masterpiece of a dish.
meanings.sent5: To truly bhuna the dish, you need to be patient and let the flavors develop.
